name: The Experiment of Professor Rouss
description:
What is going on in your subconscious?

The American Professor makes an attempt to find it out using his unique method of associations and discovers what's on your mind... Or rather what's in it...

This game consists of 2 parts:

1. A retold story by a czech writer Karel Capek translated into English by me

2. An association test.

I ask you not to expect serious characteristics, because the author (me) is not a professional psychologist, but merely a fan of intellectual detective stories.

As, hopefully, you are.

Yours,

Aliya Renata T.
